Package suga.engine.physics.hitboxes

Class SquareHitBox

java.lang.Object
suga.engine.physics.hitboxes.SquareHitBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
HitBox
public class SquareHitBox extends Object implements HitBox
Every collidable object needs a HitBox. This is a box where if a test point overlaps with a box then a collision occurs. This hit box does not interact with the z component of objects, and thus makes a

  • Constructor Details

    • SquareHitBox

      public SquareHitBox(double width, double height, Vector pos)
      Creates a new square hit box with the given position and relative sizes.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the hit box.
      height - The height of the hit box.
      pos - The center position of this hit box.

    • SquareHitBox

      public SquareHitBox(double width, double height)
      Creates a new square hit box with the given relative sizes in the horizontal and vertical directions. This hit box will be centered at (0, 0, 0) until pos is updated with setPos(Vector).
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the hit box.
      height - The height of the hit box.

    • isInside

      public boolean isInside(Vector test)
      Tests whether the given point is within this HitBox or not.
      Specified by:
      isInside in interface HitBox
      Parameters:
      test - The point to test. Represented in vector form.
      Returns:
      True if and only if the test point is inside this HitBox.

    • touching

      public boolean touching(Vector test)
      Tests whether the given point is touching this HitBox or not.
      Specified by:
      touching in interface HitBox
      Parameters:
      test - The point to test. Represented in vector form.
      Returns:
      True if and only if the test point is on the boundary of this HitBox.

    • getTestPoints

      public Collection<Vector> getTestPoints()
      Returns a collection of test points to determine if this HitBox is colliding with another.
      Specified by:
      getTestPoints in interface HitBox
      Returns:
      A list of test points to look for collisions at.

    • setPos

      public void setPos(Vector pos)
      Sets the center position of this hit box. Used to center hit boxes on game objects.
      Specified by:
      setPos in interface HitBox
      Parameters:
      pos - The new center position of this hit box.

    • drawHitBox

      public void drawHitBox(GraphicsPanelInterface panel)
      Draws this hit box to the given graphics panel. Different hit boxes may appear differently when drawn.
      Specified by:
      drawHitBox in interface HitBox
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel to draw the hit box test points to.
